unnormalised: Okay, mhunnllear konnem PAN card-ache vixayant vicharle... mhunnllear, kiteak itli mhotvachi, sorkar? Mhaka sangonk di, ti fokot ek fancy alphanumeric code nhoi (mhojem ABCDE1234F, khorench nhoi!). Ti praktically financial duniyent tujem digital passport. Income Tax Dept-ak tujem report card mhunn chint. Zori tunvem chuk keli ani fund lhipounk survat keli, tor tankam "tax evasion" mhunnche adim te tujer yetole!
normalised: Bore, konnen tori P-A-N card vishim vicharl'lem... mhonnllear, kitench na tem, sori? Punn hanv tumkam sangtam, tem fokot eka borenk poddttolim alphanyumeric code poros odik (mhujem A-B-C-D-E one two three four F, khorench nhoi!). Tem lagim lagim tumchem digital passport financial sonvsarant. Tem Income Tax Departmentak tumchem report card mhonn chint. Tum chuk korun duble poishe lipounta mhonnlear, te tumcher zolmuk zaltear "tax evasion" mhonnunk poddonam!

unnormalised: Seriously punn, PAN (Permanent Account Number) aizkal sogllea vostunchea pasun zai. Bank account ugddonk? PAN card. Tujem ITR file koronk? PAN card. Rs. 50,000 voilem property viktem gheunk? Tunvem guess kelem - PAN card! Ti kiteak tori lhan transaction-amchea pasun zai aizkal, ani soglle zann self-attested copy magtole. Mhunnun, tika tujem molachem document no. 1 mhunn trat kor!
normalised: Khorench mhonnllear, P-A-N (Permanent Account Number) hem soddunk lagim lagim sogllea vostunk zai. Bank account ugoddunk? P-A-N card. Tumchem I-T-R vortunk? P-A-N card. Rupia ponchass hazara poros odik molachi property vikti ghetunk? Tumchea dolleanim tem disla - P-A-N card! Tem konne vellar chotle vikren khatir zai, azkal, ani soglleamnim self-attested copy magta. Mhonnun, tem tumchem moladik kagod number ek mhonn mandun ghe!

unnormalised: Ani multiple PAN cards ghevnk *chintnaka*. Income Tax Department khevnk na. Te tumkam ek bhari fine martole. Tem ek jivitkalant don veg-vegllea lokak bhaxen zaina - systemak tem avoddonam. Mhunnun, tankam tunvem dil'lem sangata rav ani tika surakshit dovornk. Ideally, original sangata ghevnk naka; fokot photocopy. Punn, mhaka mhojem original surakshit dovornk nam, mhunnun hanv bhari advisor nhoi.
normalised: Ani anek P-A-N cards dhorunchea vishim chintunk porian naka. Income Tax Department khelnam. Te tumcher zonnzonnit dandd pettounk laitat. Tem eka zannttenk don vegveglle munis zal'le bhaxen - systemak te avoddinam. Mhonnun, tumkam dilem tem gheun rav ani tem surakshit dovorn. Chodd korun, tumchem original aspass zoddchem nhoi; fakt xerox zodd. Punn, mhaka mhujem original surakshit dovornam, mhonnun hanv tumkam sangunk shaktona.

unnormalised: Plus, tujem PAN Aadhaar-ak link korop aizkal mandatory. Tem sarkar mhunnlle bhaxen asa, "Tumi konn tori asa mhunn amkam kolltta, ani tumchi financial sthiti amkam kolltta. Kaslem tori funny koronk prayatn kor naka." Tem thodem Big Brother-ish asa, khoim, punn hey, at least tem vostu sope korta, sorkar? Zori hanv honest asa, hanvem hem deadline-ache adle disa kelem. Adim vostu kiteak koronk?
normalised: Ani tumchem P-A-N Aadhaarak zoddop azkal soddunk manddke zal'le bhaxen. Tem sorkar mhonta bhaxen, "Tum konn mhonn amkam khobor asa, ani tumchem financial condition kitem mhonn amkam khobor asa. Kitem-i chukichem korunk sodunk naka." Tem thodde Big Brother-ishem asa, punn atam-i, tem sadon kortole, sori? Punn, hanv khorem sangtam mhonnllear, hanvem hem extended deadline-ache adle disa kelem. Adim kiteak korchem?

unnormalised: Mhunnun, TL;DR (too long; didn't read): PAN card = super important. Tika respect-an trat kor. Tika tujea Aadhaar-ak link kor (mhunjem 9876 5432 1012). Ani all that is holy-chea mogak, tika harovnk naka! Nouvem ghevop ek pain in the rear end asa. Tem nouvem passport ghevope vodlem sope asa punn.
normalised: Mhonnun, T-L slash D-R (too long; didn't read): P-A-N card = khub mhotvachem. Tem khorench dekhun ghevun rav. Tem tumchea Aadhaar-ak zodd (mhujem nine eight seven six five four three two one zero one two). Ani devacho mog aslear, tem zoddnak soddonaka! Nouvem ghetunk pidd aasa. Punn nove passport ghetlea poros tem sadon asa, hanv tem dita.
